attributes.action: Change the way some people in England act when the get Scottish money and refuse it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of going to England and them having such a problem with taking our money. Its the same, just different prints. It is so stupid! Does my head in. When i have had English money in Scotland they are fine with it, maybe a quick we check to see if its authentic...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
